favourites.name: SWEET TOOTH
favourites.description: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

favourites.name: AFTER SEX
favourites.description: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

favourites.name: NEGRONI
favourites.description: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
